languages.text: "Затянувшееся восстание не могло не ударить по боевому духу солдат. Дисциплина и верность Богу-Императору — вот что держит людей, когда моральные ресурсы истрачены".

traits.locale_text: "Я тоже ощущаю это. Затянувшееся восстание заметно ударило по боевому духу солдат, но они все еще верны своей клятве и службе".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."
languages.original_text: "Затянувшееся восстание не могло не ударить по боевому духу солдат. Дисциплина и верность Богу-Императору — вот что держит людей, когда моральные ресурсы истрачены".

traits.locale_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."

traits.locale_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “毫无疑问，旷日持久的叛乱对士兵们的士气产生了影响。当人们的情感储备耗尽时，只有纪律与对神皇的忠诚才能让他们支撑下去。”
languages.original_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."

traits.locale_text: “毫无疑问，旷日持久的叛乱对士兵们的士气产生了影响。当人们的情感储备耗尽时，只有纪律与对神皇的忠诚才能让他们支撑下去。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «La larga duración de la rebelión ha socavado la moral de los soldados, no hay duda. La disciplina y la lealtad al Dios Emperador son lo que mantiene viva a la gente cuando sus reservas emocionales se agotan».
languages.original_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."

traits.locale_text: «La larga duración de la rebelión ha socavado la moral de los soldados, no hay duda. La disciplina y la lealtad al Dios Emperador son lo que mantiene viva a la gente cuando sus reservas emocionales se agotan».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「長引く反乱が兵士たちの士気を低下させているのは間違いない。規律と神帝陛下への忠誠心、それこそが心に余裕がなくなったときに、人を支えるものとなるのだ」
languages.original_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."

traits.locale_text: 「長引く反乱が兵士たちの士気を低下させているのは間違いない。規律と神帝陛下への忠誠心、それこそが心に余裕がなくなったときに、人を支えるものとなるのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Die langwierige Rebellion hat sich zweifellos auf die Moral der Soldaten niedergeschlagen. Disziplin und Loyalität gegenüber dem Gottimperator ... lassen die Leute weitermachen, wenn alle emotionalen Reserven erschöpft sind."
languages.original_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."

traits.locale_text: "Die langwierige Rebellion hat sich zweifellos auf die Moral der Soldaten niedergeschlagen. Disziplin und Loyalität gegenüber dem Gottimperator ... lassen die Leute weitermachen, wenn alle emotionalen Reserven erschöpft sind."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « La rébellion prolongée a forcément un impact sur le moral des troupes. Une fois vos réserves émotionnelles vides, c'est a discipline et la loyauté envers l'Empereur-Dieu qui vous permettent de continuer. »
languages.original_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."

traits.locale_text: « La rébellion prolongée a forcément un impact sur le moral des troupes. Une fois vos réserves émotionnelles vides, c'est a discipline et la loyauté envers l'Empereur-Dieu qui vous permettent de continuer. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Uzatmalı isyanın askerlerin moralleri üstünde derin etkiler bıraktığı şüphesiz. Disiplin ve Tanrı İmparator'a sadakat, duygusal rezervler tükendiğinde insanları ayakta tutan şeylerdir."
languages.original_text: "The protracted rebellion has no doubt taken a toll on the soldiers' morale. Discipline and loyalty to the God-Emperor, that is what sustains people when emotional reserves are depleted."
